21.10.2013 JH SCR18431Type=4 Changed hardcoded selecttion on EU into GSET_INFSCODE(226)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Debtor number')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Administration number')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Client number')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Debtor name')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Debtor city')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Debtor country')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Credit Limit')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Financed amount')&{0,16}&MlsTrans ('Reinsurance')

MlsTrans ('Debtor number')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Administration number')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Client number')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Debtor name')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Debtor city')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Debtor country')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Credit Limit')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Financed amount')&{0,15}&MlsTrans ('Reinsurance')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBH_NO, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, (select cast (sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO) from :1/DEBH where (select cast (sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO) > :2

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Debtor number')&{0,6}&MlsTrans ('Debtor name')&{0,6}&MlsTrans ('Debtor city')&{0,6}&MlsTrans ('Debtor country')&{0,6}&MlsTrans ('Sum Limits')&{0,6}&MlsTrans ('Financed amount')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC.DEBC_DEBC, DEBC.DEBC_DEBH, DEBB.DEBB_ACTINVAH, DHIC.DHIC_ID, DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE, DEBC.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC.DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE, DEBC.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM , DEBC.DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE1, DEBC.DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE2, DEBC.DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE3
from
:1/DEBC DEBC, :1/DEBB DEBB, :1/DHIC DHIC
where
DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC.DEBC_NO and DHIC.DHIC_DEBH = DEBC.DEBC_DEBH and DEBC.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT <> DEBC.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM and DEBC.DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE = 1 and DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE in ('KV' ) and DEBC.DEBC_NO not in (select DEBC.DEBC_NO from :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/DEBB DEBB, :1/DHIC DHIC , :1/GSET GSET where DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC.DEBC_NO and DHIC.DHIC_DEBH = DEBC.DEBC_DEBH and DEBC.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT <> DEBC.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM and GSET.GSET_ID = 226 and DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE = GSET_INFSCODE)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Debtor number')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Administration number')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Client number')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Debtor name')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Debtor city')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Debtor country')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Credit Limit')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Euler Hermes Grade')&{0,13}&MlsTrans ('Euler Hermes Grade amount')
